creator: Citibank UK Limited
descriptionHtml:
Citi Mobile® UK app is the convenient way to take care of your everyday banking needs on the go.

With the Citi Mobile® UK app you can:
• View your most important account details with Fingerprint Sign On.
• Check your banking and investment account balances
• Enable Citibank Global Wallet for intelligent currency switching to spend abroad like a local without FX and card commission fees.
• Receive important account information with Push Notifications.
• View your Investment holdings
• Send money all over the world in foreign currencies and make fee-free online payments to your Citibank accounts globally
• Transfer funds both locally and internationally to new and existing payees
• Pay your bills
• Activate your card
• Link your card to a primary account of your choice
• Use Citi Mobile® Token to authenticate yourself for your online banking transactions

App Permissions & Your Security

To ensure confidence and peace of mind for clients who use our services, at Citi we’re continually improving and developing our security measures.

With this in mind, the Citi Mobile® UK App has been designed to recognize specific device data, through certain permissions, to create a unique device profile – building a greater trust connection between your device and our fraud prevention systems. This allows Citi to intuitively react to anything out of the ordinary, as well as enabling Fingerprint Sign On to function securely.

We are committed to respecting your privacy and will never store or use data in other ways than explicitly declared.

The use of this Citi Mobile® UK App is only for Citi UK customers and customers of Citi International Personal Bank who are served by Citibank UK Ltd or Citibank N.A., Jersey branch. Content provided via this Citi Mobile® UK App is not specifically created for any territory other than where Citi Mobile® UK App operates/is licensed to operate.

descriptionShort: Make your life easier with the new Citi Mobile® UK App

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Trusted Merchant Whitelisting – You can now manage (view/delete) your ‘trusted merchant list’ in the mobile app.

Reason for Payment – You will be asked to select a reason for payment when making transfers via Citi Mobile UK App, which then will give tailored warnings to help protect you against fraud and scams.
